Html:
Hi,

 Just thought I'd drop a quick post to say how eternally grateful I am for this library.  I've been struggling with failing sendkeys, and me being a coding amatuer trying to get sendinput working. 

 Then I found your library!

 All of a sudden my media center addin is a way and working.  Can't thank you enough.

 Cheers,

Ben.

Glad to hear it! Good luck. Mike

Sent from my iPhone

On 16/06/2010, at 9:29 PM, "mrgadgetnz" <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: mrgadgetnz

Hi,

Just thought I'd drop a quick post to say how eternally grateful I am for this library. I've been struggling with failing sendkeys, and me being a coding amatuer trying to get sendinput working.

Then I found your library.

All of a sudden my media center addin is a way and working. Can't thank you enough.

Cheers,

Ben.
